org.baswell.httproxy

Interface IOProxyDirector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProxyDirector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleIODirector

    public interface IOProxyDirector
extends ProxyDirector
    A ProxyDirector for blocking IO. All implementations of this interface must be thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • getSleepSecondsOnReadWait

        int getSleepSecondsOnReadWait()
        Returns:
        The number of seconds to sleep when a Socket's inputstream is still open but no content is available.
